K14n285u_001:1: 1 | bodhisattvo bhagavān urubilvāyāṃ vihāraṃ nadyā nairañjanāyāstīre bodhimūle sātatyakārī nipako bodhipākṣikeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyuktoviharati
K14n285u_001:2: 2 | sa rātryāḥ prathame yāme ṛddhiviṣayajñānasākṣīkriyāyā abhijñāyāṃ cittaṃ abhinirnāmayatyanekavidham ṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati |
K14n285u_001:6: tiraskuḍyaṃ tiraḥśailaṃ tiraḥprākāram asajyamānaḥ kāyena gacchati tadyathā ākāśe pṛthivyām unmajjananimajjanaṃ karoti tadyathā udake |
K14n285u_001:7: udake asajyamānaḥ kāyena gacchati tadyathā pṛthivyām |
K14n285u_001:8: ākāśe paryaṃgena vikramate tadyathā pakṣi śakuniḥ |
K14n285u_001:9: imāvapi candrasūryau evaṃ mahardhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārjati parimārjayati yāvad brahmalokādapi kāyena vaśe vartayati |
K14n285u_001:10: 4 | iti bodhisattvo bhagavān uruvilvāyāṃ viharaṃ nadyā nairañjanāyāstīre bodhimūle sātatyakārī nipako bodhipākṣikeṣū dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto viharaṃ rātryāḥ prathame yāme anekavidham ṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati |
K14n285u_001:11: 5 | atha bodhisattvo bhagavān uruvilvāyāṃ viharaṃ pūrvavad yāvad anuyukto viharati |
K14n285u_001:12: 6 | sa rātryāḥ prathame yāme pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānasākṣīkriyāyā abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirnāmayati so'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃsamanusmarati |
K14n285u_001:13: 7 | tadyathaikāṃ jātiṃ dve tisraścatasraḥ yāvad anekānapi saṃvartakalpān samanusmarati |
K14n285u_001:14: 8 | iti bodhisattvo bhagavāṃ uruvilvāyāṃ viharaṃ nadyā nairañjanāyāstīre bodhimūle sātatyakārī nipako bodhipākṣikeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto viharaṃ rātryāḥ prathame yāme pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati |
K14n285u_001:15: 9 | atha bodhisattvo bhagavān uruvilvāyāṃ viharaṃ pūrvavad yāvad anuyukto viharati |
K14n285u_001:16: 10 | sa rātryā madhyame yāme divyaśrotrajñānasākṣīkriyāyā abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirnāmayati divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāṃtamānuṣeṇaubhayām śṛṇoti mānuṣāṃśca ye vā dūre ye vāntike |
K14n285u_001:17: 11 | iti bodhisattvo bhagavān uruvilvāyāṃ viharaṃ nadyā nairañjanāyāstīre bodhimūle sātatyakārī nipako bodhipākṣikeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto viharaṃ rātryā madhyame yāme divyaśrotrajñānaṃ pratyanubhavati |
K14n285u_001:18: 12 | atha bodhisattvo bhagavān uruvilvāyāṃ viharaṃ pūrvavad yāvad anuyukto viharati |
K14n285u_001:19: 13 | sa rātryā madhyame yāme divyacakṣurjñānasākṣīkriyāyā vidyāyāṃ cittam abhinirnāmayati |
K14n285u_001:20: 14 | divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavamānānapyupapadyamānānapi suvarṇānapi durvarṇānapi hīnānapi praṇītānapi sugatimapi gacchato durgatimapi yathākarmopagān sattvān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
K14n285u_001:21: 15 | itīme bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayo mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetostaddhetostatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātam narakeṣūpapadyante |
K14n285u_001:22: 16 | ime vā punarbhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetostaddhetostatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante |
K14n285u_001:23: 17 | iti bodhisattvo bhagavān urubilvāyāṃ viharaṃ nadyā nairaṃjanāyāstire bodhimūle sātatyakārī nipako bodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogama anuyukto viharaṃ rātryā madhyame yāme divyacakṣurjñānaṃ pratyanubhavati |
K14n285u_001:24: 18 | atha bodhisattvo bhagavān urubilvāyāṃ viharaṃ pūrvavad yavad anuyukto viharati |
K14n285u_001:25: 19 | sa rātryā paścime yāme cetaḥparyāyajñasākṣikriyāya abhijñāyam cittam abhinirnāmayati |
K14n285u_001:26: 20 | parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānaṃ vitarkitaṃ vicaritaṃ manasā mānasaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
K14n285u_001:27: sarāgacittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
K14n285u_001:29: sadveṣaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ samoham vigatamohaṃ vikṣiptaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhitam
K14n285u_001:30: uddhataṃ anuddhataṃ avyupaśāntaṃ vyupaśantaṃ samāhitaṃ asamāhitam abhāvitaṃ bhāvitaṃ avimuktaṃ cittam avimuktaṃ cittaṃ iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
K14n285u_001:31: 21 | iti bodhisattvo bhagavān urubilvāyāṃ viharaṃ nadyā nairaṃjanāyāstire bodhimūle sātatyakārī nipako bodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto viharaṃ rātryāḥ paścime yāmecetaḥparyāyajñānaṃ pratyanubhavati |
K14n285u_001:32: 22 | atha bodhisattvo bhagavān urubilvāyāṃ viharaṃ pūrvavad yāvad anuyukto viharati |
K14n285u_001:33: 23 | sa rātryāḥ paścime yāme āsravakṣayajñānasākṣikriyāyā abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirnāmayati |
K14n285u_001:34: 24 | idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
K14n285u_001:37: iyaṃ duḥkhannirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
K14n285u_001:38: tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāccittaṃ vimucyate |
K14n285u_001:41: kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti |
K14n285u_001:42: 25 |iti bhagavān urubilvayāṃ viharaṃ nadyā nairaṃjanāyāstīre bodhimūle kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ saṃbuddhabodhis tejodhātuṃ samapannaḥ |
